TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Queue`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class Queue(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Queue : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type Queue<'T> = class interface seq<'T> interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定佇列中項目的類型。

span.span: Specifies the type of elements in the queue.

summary.span: 表示物件的先進先出 (FIFO) 集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作一般的佇列，以循環的陣列。This class implements a generic queue as a circular array. 物件儲存在其中一端插入和移除其他。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. 佇列和堆疊時很有用的資訊; 需暫存儲存體也就是當您可能想要擷取其值之後捨棄項目。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果您需要存取相同的順序，將它儲存在集合中的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果您要以相反順序存取的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用或如果您需要從多個執行緒同時存取集合。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 三個主要的作業可對和其項目：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 將項目加入至結尾。 adds an element to the end of the . - 從開頭移除最舊的項目。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 預覽會傳回最舊的項目，是在開頭但不會移除從。 peek returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 接受`null`參考有效的值類型，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A可支援多個讀取器同時，只要不修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範這個建構函式，以及數種其他方法的泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several other methods of the generic class. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 將元素複製到在相同的順序，而在讀取的集合。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the collection. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`collection`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `collection`. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 是設為零，並且從項目集合中的其他物件的參考也釋出。 is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量會維持不變。The capacity remains unchanged. 若要重設的容量，呼叫。To reset the capacity of the , call . 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷使用的預設相等比較子的相等針對`T`，佇列中的值型別。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the queue. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運是的項目數，可以儲存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量永遠是大於或等於。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過容量加入元素時，會自動將舊的項目複製並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部陣列增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法泛型類別，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates several properties and methods of the generic class, including the property. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. span.span: The object that is removed from the beginning of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法與 方法類似，但是 不會修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . 如果型別`T`是參考型別`null`可以加入至做為值。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be added to the as a value. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量的容量會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比內部陣列的容量，這個方法是 o （1） 作業。If is less than the capacity of the internal array, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果內部陣列需要重新配置以便容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the internal array needs to be reallocated to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範是可列舉的泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates that the generic class is enumerable. `foreach`陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中) 用來列舉佇列。The `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) is used to enumerate the queue. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果來源的類型無法自動轉換成目的地類型`array`，實作非泛型擲回，而泛型實作擲回。If the type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`, the non-generic implementations of throw , whereas the generic implementations throw . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 會傳回物件，該物件可用來同步處理對 的存取。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理是所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時，才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回目前的執行個體。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns the current instance.

An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 將 項目複製到新的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements to a new array.

returns.span: 新的陣列，包含複製自 的元素。

span.span: A new array containing elements copied from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 則不會修改。The is not modified. 新陣列中項目的順序是從開頭項目的順序相同至它的結尾。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會建立字串的佇列預設容量，並使用排入佇列五個字串的方法。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 列舉佇列的項目，這不會變更佇列的狀態。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用來清除佇列的第一個字串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法來查看佇列中下一個項目，然後方法用來清除佇列。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用來建立陣列，並將佇列項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立佇列的複本。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的佇列大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 建構函式會再次用來建立包含在開頭的三個 null 項目佇列的第二個複本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在佇列中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示佇列是空的。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TrimExcess() cil managed

summary.span: 如果該數目小於目前容量的 90%，則將容量設為 中項目的實際數目。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用記憶體降到最低集合的額外負荷如果沒有新的項目會加入至集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新配置及複製大型的成本不過，可能相當大，因此方法不執行任何動作，如果清單是在多個容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 這可避免產生大型的重新配置成本相對較小的改善。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要重設設為初始狀態，呼叫方法之前呼叫方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity.
